answerText: geoid [10] This is the geophysical principle of the buoyant equilibrium of the Earth's crust, which explains why Greenland and the Great Lakes region are currently rising.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2015 | Illinois A + Ottawa A  | 20 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This is the shape that the surface of oceans would take under the influences of rotation and gravitation alone. For 10 points each: [10] Name this equipotential surface, first described by Gauss.
